actions.name: AcknowledgeMessage
actions.description: Grants permission to acknowledge a message, ensuring it will not be delivered again

actions.name: DeleteMessage
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a message

actions.name: FailMessage
actions.description: Grants permission to fail a message, signifying the message could not be processed successfully, ensuring it cannot be replied to or delivered again

actions.name: GetEndpoint
actions.description: Grants permission to route traffic to the correct endpoint based on the given destination for the messages

actions.name: GetMessages
actions.description: Grants permission to deliver messages to clients/instances using long polling

actions.name: SendReply
actions.description: Grants permission to send replies from clients/instances to upstream service
